thread.title: The Watch List for Oct. 3
thread.title_full: The Watch List for Oct. 3 - Sports - The Buffalo News

author: buffalonews
title: The Watch List for Oct. 3
text:
LIVE EVENTS
College Football
• Bowling Green at UB, 3:30 p.m., UB Stadium.
Horse Racing
• Batavia Downs, 6:35 p.m.
ON TELEVISION
Auto Racing
• Xfinity Hisense 200, 3:30 p.m., NBCSN.
Boxing
• Adrien Broner vs. Khalib Allakhverdiev, 10 p.m., SHOW.
• Lucas Matthysse vs. Viktor Postol, 10:15 p.m., HBO.
College Football
• Iowa at Wisconsin, noon, ESPN.
• Purdue at Michigan State, noon, ESPN2.
• Texas at TCU,. noon, ABC.
• Army at Penn State, noon, ESPNU.
• St. John Fisher at Buffalo State, noon, TWCSN.
• Stony Brook at James Madison, noon, SNY.
• Louisville at N.C. State, 12:30 p.m., WNLO.
• Alabama at Georgia, 3:30 p.m., CBS.
• Florida State at Wake Forest, 3:30 p.m., ESPN.
• Ohio State at Indiana, 3:30 p.m., ABC.
• Texas Tech at Baylor, 3:30 p.m., ESPN2.
• North Carolina at Georgia Tech, 3:30 p.m., ESPNU.
• Bowling Green at UB, 3:30 p.m., TWCSN.
• Elon at New Hampshire, 3:30 p.m., WNYO.
• Eastern Michigan at LSU, 7 p.m., ESPNU.
• Kansas State at Oklahoma State, 4 p.m., FS1.
• Mississippi at Florida, 7 p.m., ESPN.
• Arkansas at Tennessee, 7 p.m., ESPN2.
• Arizona State at UCLA, 7:30 p.m., FOX.
• Notre Dame at Clemson, 8 p.m., ABC.
• Oregon at Colorado, 10 p.m., ESPN.
• Hawaii at Boise State, 10:15 p.m., ESPN2.
Horse Racing
• Breeders’ Cup Challenge Series, Keeneland, 5 p.m., NBC.
MLB
• N.Y. Yankees at Baltimore, noon, YES.
• Washington at N.Y. Mets, 1 p.m., SNY.
• L.A. Angels at Texas, 1 p.m., FOX.
• N.Y. Yankees at Baltimore, 7 p.m., YES.
• Washington at N.Y. Mets, 7 p.m., SNY.
Soccer
• English Premier League: Crystal Palace vs. West Bromwich, 7:45 a.m., NBCSN.
• English Premier League: Manchester City vs. Newcastle, 10 a.m., NBCSN.
• English Premier League: Chelsea vs. Southampton, 12:30 p.m., NBC.
• MLS: Columbus at N.Y. Red Bulls, 7 p.m., MSG.
ON RADIO
College Football
• Alabama at Georgia, 2:30 p.m., 550.
• Bowling Green at UB, 3:30 p.m., 1520.
High School Football
• Riverside at Lockport, 2 p.m., 1340.
